text: Jason Jordan Segel (born January 18, 1980) is an American movie, television, and voice actor who is known for his roles as Marshall Eriksen in How I Met Your Mother and Jimmy in the Apple TV+ series Shrinking. He has also appeared in Despicable Me (2010) and The Muppets (2011). He was born in Los Angeles, California. He was partners with actress Michelle Williams from 2012 through early 2013. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles
title: Jason Segel
